text: læa meux mi bth hnung bth dı khx ngxal kru xan thuk prathan lng ma dangnan nı hmu phwk khea mi phu klaw khun wa “mi khır bang nı phwk than thi bth ni thahı sraththa pheim khun? “Sahrab brrda phu thi mi khwam sraththa nan bth ni di thahı kar sraththa pheim khun kæ phwk khea læw phwk khea k mi khwam piti yindi
